quizzes.title: React Basics Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of React fundamentals.

questions.question: What is JSX in React?
questions.explanation: JSX lets you write HTML in JavaScript.

questions.question: State updates in React are synchronous.
questions.explanation: They are asynchronous for performance reasons.
